About This Project

A creative experiment blending multiple Bootstrap 5 components into a clean layout.

Hi, I'm Vennu Sai Charan 👋

This project demonstrates my ability to design responsive, modular websites using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 5, and JavaScript. Each component—navbar, card, footer—is reusable and maintainable, showcasing professional-grade structure and clarity.

© 2025 Vennu Sai Charan | Built with ❤️ using Bootstrap 5
